resources.string:
Lauren is a creative soul who loves coding, designing and creating new things. 

Lauren firmly believes that you can learn anything you want to; she is a self-taught data analyst/ Business Intellingence Analyst having studied Chemical Engineering at UCT. 

Lauren is currently learning Kotlin to become an Android Developer. 

Her dream is to create Android apps that are seamless and easy to use from a UX perspective and that combine beautiful and up to date UI. 

She is obsessive about writing code that is well documented, easy to follow and conforms to coding guidelines. 

Lauren loves the outdoors, experiencing new places and cultures and is always busy planning her next adventure!
